name: PageTransition
summary: A \"page flip\" transition using Core Animation.
description: A "page flip" transition using Core Animation. When animated, a single page of new content falls in from the left edge of the frame. Can be customized to flip from left or right, forward or backward. Designed for `UIViewController` transitions. Includes the `CALayer` subclass that performs the animation, a custom `UIView` with that layer as backing layer, and a premade `UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning` object.
